name: Horror Pong
description:
I’m proud of this one. It’s the first game that I made a game that works, and I promise that it will not be the last. 

I hope you guys enjoy it, and happy Halloween!

Also, I forgot to mention that this is a two-player game, so find a friend and play this game with them.

Here is a link to all my social media accounts. 🌴🌊🎞🧟‍♂️🌴

https://campsite.bio/puppetmasta4life
